ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of PAUL JOHN GRIFFIN of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of Marine Atlantic Inc., on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, effective December 10, 2011.
